name: WPFrank Companion
author: WP Frank

sections.description:
This is companion plugin is created for WP Frank themes.
The plugin add custom frontpage sections for WP Frank themes and it will allow you full customizer settings for the theme front page sections.
The plugin options are user-friendly and you can use this plugin for BusinessExpo WordPress theme.

EXTERNAL RESOURCES

Architect Designs Child Theme

Readme version mismtach fixed.

new section added in parent theme
limit added in documentation part
also fixed crypto mining and crypto compare

sections.reviews:
Great Plugin and Great Support

By dezzell1 on May 17, 2023

For days and days I was looking for a good theme with everything ready to go, and came across a theme called BusinessExpo which came with WP Frank Companion. At first I ran into an issue and contacted support. They were very quick to reply and was able to get me up and running quickly. Very good theme and support. I am using the Medical Health theme built on BusinessExpo. Check it out and you will see how easy it is to use and setup.

Thanks,
David

Excellent!

By iceblaster on June 13, 2021

Great theme, simple enough "out of box" (if that's what you want), and with minimal amendments required. Great support from the developer! Try it! Thanks
